about.title: About CineTime
about.heroLead: CineTime's foundations were laid in the mid-90s, during the era when film projection evolved from analog to digital. Built with a vision open to innovation, the brand defined the cinema experience not just as a viewing activity, but as an atmosphere in itself.
about.heroP2: Our first hall opened with a capacity of 180 seats. In this journey that began with 35mm projectors, viewer comfort was always a priority thanks to investments in stage, screen and acoustic systems.
about.heroAlt: Deluxe auditorium ‚Äì lounge seats and ambient lighting
about.missionBody: We make cinema accessible, comfortable and delightful. We unify theaters in your city, offer fast ticketing and personalized picks.

grid1.title: Advanced Auditoriums
grid1.body: 4K projection, HDR and tuned acoustics for crystal-clear scenes. Seating angles and sightlines are optimized.
grid1.alt: Auditorium with wide screen and acoustic panels

grid2.title: Curated Concessions
grid2.body: Fresh popcorn, gourmet drinks and snacks. Order online and pick up fast.

grid3.title: Relaxing Lounge
grid3.body: A modern lounge for meetups before the show: comfy seating, charging points and fast Wi-Fi.

m1995.title: Foundation & First Screen
m1995.desc: Amid the analog-to-digital shift of the 90s, CineTime laid its roots.
m1995.p1: Opened the first auditorium with 180 seats.
m1995.p2: Started with 35mm projectors; heavy focus on screen, acoustics and seating ergonomics.
m1995.p3: Local box office and phone reservations.
m1995.p4: Family-run culture: outstanding guest care and cleanliness.

m2005.title: Digital Transformation
m2005.desc: Scaling began with digital projection and multi-screen complexes.
m2005.p1: First 2K digital projector and infrastructure upgrades.
m2005.p3: Launched our first loyalty program and promotions.

m2015.title: Online Ticketing & Mobile
m2015.desc: We put online and mobile at the center; queues shrank, occupancy improved.
m2015.p1: Seat selection and contactless e-tickets on the web.
m2015.p2: iOS/Android apps with QR entry codes.
m2015.p4: Ops console for reporting and dynamic pricing.

m2020.title: Data & Personalization
m2020.desc: ML-powered recommendations and targeted campaigns went live.

m2025.title: Ecosystem & Premium Experience
m2025.desc: Today we deliver end-to-end experiences with premium seating, curated concessions and partner networks.
m2025.p2: Partner integrations for transport, food and event bundles.
m2025.p4: Sustainability: energy efficiency and waste reduction.

imax.title: IMAX Experience
imax.subtitle: Breathtaking scale and clarity
imax.body: IMAX fuses a wall-to-wall screen, purpose-built auditorium geometry and laser projection to push image size and fidelity to the limit. Enhanced brightness and contrast preserve detail even in the darkest scenes, while the tuned sound system delivers every nuance with power and precision. The result is a cinema experience that feels larger than life.
imax.tile1: Maximum brightness and contrast: laser projection renders deeper blacks, brighter whites and accurate color from scene to scene‚Äîideal for high-dynamic-range cinematography.
imax.tile2: Floor-to-ceiling immersion: the giant, slightly curved screen fills your field of view so you perceive more of the frame without turning your head.
imax.tile3: Sound you can feel: a custom-calibrated multi-channel system keeps whispers clear and impact thunderous, with convincing direction and distance.

4dx.title: 4DX Motion Theater
4dx.subtitle: Feel every scene
4dx.body: 4DX brings the action off the screen and into your seat with motion and environmental effects. Wind, rain, scent and light cues are synchronized to the picture, lifting adrenaline and presence without overwhelming comfort.
4dx.motionDesc: Seats move up/down, left/right and forward/back to simulate acceleration, vibration and turns‚Äîtimed precisely to the rhythm of the scene.
4dx.scentDesc: Subtle aromas triggered in select moments to reinforce setting and mood, applied sparingly to avoid fatigue.
4dx.windDesc: From gentle breeze to storm gusts, wind enhances speed and outdoor sequences with a natural feel.
4dx.rainDesc: Fine mist and droplets to support rain and splash scenes; region-controlled for comfort.

atmos.title: Dolby Atmos
atmos.subtitle: Object-based 3D audio
atmos.body: Dolby Atmos treats sounds as individual objects and adds overhead channels to introduce height. A helicopter can pass convincingly above you, and rain can fall around you with natural direction and distance. Wide dynamic range and low noise keep even the tiniest details intact.
atmos.objectAudioDesc: Each sound element carries precise positional metadata, mixed for the room and calibrated so it‚Äôs heard exactly where it belongs.
atmos.ceilingDesc: The height layer completes true 3D space, adding realism to rain, flight and ambient effects.

vip.title: CineTime VIP
vip.subtitle: Maximum comfort, minimal noise
vip.body: CineTime VIP turns moviegoing into personal comfort. Spacious recliners and extra legroom keep you relaxed in longer features, while a quieter atmosphere, limited capacity and dedicated service minimize distractions.
vip.reclinersDesc: Adjustable back and leg support for ergonomic posture; soft upholstery and generous width for long-form comfort.
vip.loungeDesc: A calm space to unwind before or after the show‚Äîlight refreshments, charging points and cozy seating.
vip.serviceDesc: Snacks and drinks delivered to your seat so you never miss a moment.
vip.priorityEntryDesc: With a dedicated entrance and fast track, you enter without queues and settle into your seat comfortably.

family.title: Family Lounge
family.subtitle: Cinema that fits families
family.body: Designed so parents and kids can enjoy the big screen together with ease. Softer lighting, generous seating and convenient amenities make short breaks simple and stress-free. Volume and content choices are balanced with family expectations in mind.
family.kidsAreaDesc: A safe corner with age-appropriate toys, coloring books and soft seating. Perfect for pre/post-show energy; open sightlines let parents supervise comfortably.
family.babyCareDesc: Changing table, wipes station and a comfortable nursing chair‚Äîhandle essentials without leaving the lounge. Nearby sinks and hygiene bins streamline quick cleanups.
